remarks: Define addition on positive reals.  From Section 11.2.1 of [HoTT], p. (varies).  We write this definition to closely resemble the definition in HoTT although some of the conditions (for example, ` r e. Q. ` and ` r e. ( 1st `` x ) ` ) conditions are redundant and can be simplified as shown at ~ genpdf . This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers, and is intended to be used only by the construction.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 26-Sep-2019.)
